# UIDatePickerStyle.compact

**Case**

A style indicating that the date picker displays as a label that when tapped displays a calendar-style editor.

## Declaration

```swift
case compact
```

## Discussion

You can’t use this style with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/Mode/countDownTimer] mode.

## Styles

- **UIDatePickerStyle.automatic**: A style indicating that the system picks the concrete style based on the current platform and date picker mode.
- **UIDatePickerStyle.inline**: A style indicating that the date pickers displays as an inline, editable field.
- **UIDatePickerStyle.wheels**: A style indicating that the date picker displays as a wheel picker.
